Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time for processing from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time taken for a Declaration to go from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Payment Handled
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time between Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in cases where re-submission occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total resolution time of cases involving Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time it takes for a Declaration to be APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER after being REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time for a Declaration to move from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total time for all activities to complete after Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in the process flow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average time for a Declaration to be APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that were previously REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum resolution time of cases that include Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and end with Payment Handled
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, in cases where this path is followed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment across all variants involving this activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'
